Don’t miss out on NCS - info needed!
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope you’re looking forward to NCS! This is what you could have in store...
Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a591P6wYiGU
We’ve sent your parent or guardian a letter or email explaining that they need to complete parts of your NCS application. As we can’t confirm your place until this happens, please ask your parent or guardian to complete your application. This is part of your college course so make sure you get this done!
They will have a list of what we need in the letter or email we sent, along with instructions on how to do it. You can see which parts of your application we need your parent or guardian to do by logging in to your young person's account here.
Any questions? We're here to help - you can email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org or call us on 0203 542 2400.
So speak to your parent or guardian as soon as you can.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
